channel.title: [317] Rs Custom [317]
channel.description:
This is a [317] Server And Client I've been working on and it says we can show off our work here! So I thought "Well ok! Lets show off then!" I'll be posting Updates and such that I've done to my client or server and the like! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b][u]My Goal:[/u][/b] Make a child friendly game with No-cussing and appropriate content that is still fun to play! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Updates to this date that I have no date for:[/b] Made a Attack Interface for skills tab! :D [IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo260/Aceoren/RSCustomAttackInterfaceScreeny.png[/img]
Updated the Attack Interface for the skills tab,A brand new very cool looking one that's not like the tutorial one I made! [u][b]Picture later![/b][/u]
[b][i]Client Tragedy 2-14-10:[/i][/b]Client crashed and burned went completely NUTS have to get a new one! This time I'm getting a COMPLETELY empty client!
[b][u]Client YAY! 2-14-10:[/u][/b] Got a new client! [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397220.0.htm]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397220.0.htm[/url] Gotta figure out this! When you click the armor button it crashes well back to work I am!
[b][u]Server Screw Up:[/u][/b] I Got a peace of Crap for a base and now i'm paying in hours for not finding a better one... Well... Back to the keyboard!
[s][b][u]This is driving up the wall,So I got a Server/Client Bundle:[/u][/b]Hopefully these work for a base but,Its another fully customized peace of crap so I gotta do gutting which I was TRYING to avoid! MAHH! Heres what i'm using [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,426092.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,426092.0.html[/url][/s]
[b][u]February 26,New Server and client!:[/u][/b]Using a gutted deltascape and a Refactored client! Woot I think i'm getting somewhere now! :D

[/quote]

item.title: [317] Rs Custom [317]
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

zyle1992:

So basically, your gutting a piece of shit server, with a piece of shit client, and hope people will use it. Piece of Shit + Piece of Shit = Bigger Piece of Shit.

Indeed,Exactly what I was thinking,So I got a base that I think is good… But its a gutted Deltascape,I mean like REALLY gutted,But Eh working emotes is good enough for me and I got a good and easy to edit and mess around with client so The piece of crap is now smaller! Well at least till the deltascape goes and Craps up…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Rs Custom [317]
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

This is a [317] Server And Client I’ve been working on and it says we can show off our work here! So I thought “Well ok! Lets show off then!”
I’ll be posting Updates and such that I’ve done to my client or server and the like!

My Goal:
Make a child friendly game with No-cussing and appropriate content that is still fun to play!

Updates to this date that I have no date for:
Made a Attack Interface for skills tab!

Updated the Attack Interface for the skills tab,A brand new very cool looking one that’s not like the tutorial one I made!
Picture later!

Client Tragedy 2-14-10:Client crashed and burned went completely NUTS have to get a new one! This time I’m getting a COMPLETELY empty client!

Client YAY! 2-14-10: Got a new client! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397220.0.htm Gotta figure out this! When you click the armor button it crashes well back to work I am!

Server Screw Up: I Got a peace of Crap for a base and now i’m paying in hours for not finding a better one… Well… Back to the keyboard!

This is driving up the wall,So I got a Server/Client Bundle:Hopefully these work for a base but,Its another fully customized peace of crap so I gotta do gutting which I was TRYING to avoid! MAHH! Heres what i’m using http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,426092.0.html

February 26,New Server and client!:Using a gutted deltascape and a Refactored client! Woot I think i’m getting somewhere now!
